titles.en: The Book of Tawheed (Oneness of Allah<sup>azwj</sup>)

text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ خَالِدٍ الطَّيَالِسِيِّ عَنْ صَفْوَانَ بْنِ يَحْيَى عَنِ ابْنِ مُسْكَانَ عَنْ أَبِي بَصِيرٍ قَالَ سَمِعْتُ أَبَا عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) يَقُولُ لَمْ يَزَلِ اللَّهُ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ رَبَّنَا وَ الْعِلْمُ ذَاتُهُ وَ لَا مَعْلُومَ وَ السَّمْعُ ذَاتُهُ وَ لَا مَسْمُوعَ وَ الْبَصَرُ ذَاتُهُ وَ لَا مُبْصَرَ وَ الْقُدْرَةُ ذَاتُهُ وَ لَا مَقْدُورَ
فَلَمَّا أَحْدَثَ الْأَشْيَاءَ وَ كَانَ الْمَعْلُومُ وَقَعَ الْعِلْمُ مِنْهُ عَلَى الْمَعْلُومِ وَ السَّمْعُ عَلَى الْمَسْمُوعِ وَ الْبَصَرُ عَلَى الْمُبْصَرِ وَ الْقُدْرَةُ عَلَى الْمَقْدُورِ

قَالَ قُلْتُ فَلَمْ يَزَلِ اللَّهُ مُتَحَرِّكاً قَالَ فَقَالَ تَعَالَى اللَّهُ عَنْ ذَلِكَ إِنَّ الْحَرَكَةَ صِفَةٌ مُحْدَثَةٌ بِالْفِعْلِ قَالَ قُلْتُ فَلَمْ يَزَلِ اللَّهُ مُتَكَلِّماً قَالَ فَقَالَ إِنَّ الْكَلَامَ صِفَةٌ مُحْدَثَةٌ لَيْسَتْ بِأَزَلِيَّةٍ كَانَ اللَّهُ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ وَ لَا مُتَكَلِّمَ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from Muhammad Bin Khalid Al Tayalisy, from Safwan Bin Yahya, from Ibn Muskan, from Abu Baseer who said,

‘I heard Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> saying: ‘Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Mighty and Majestic never ceased to be our Lord<sup>azwj</sup>; and the Knowledge is His<sup>azwj</sup> Self and (even though) there may be nothing to be known, and the Hearing is His<sup>azwj</sup> Self and (even though) there may be nothing to be heard, and the Seeing is His<sup>azwj</sup> Self and (even though) there may be nothing to be seen, and the Power is His<sup>azwj</sup> Self and (even though) there may be nothing to be empowered upon.

So when He<sup>azwj</sup> Created the things, and it was the known (things), the Knowledge Occurred from Him<sup>azwj</sup> upon the known, and the Hearing upon the heard, and the Seeing upon the seen, and the Power upon the empowered’.

He (the narrator) said, ‘I said, ‘So Allah<sup>azwj</sup> does not cease to be moving’. So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Allah<sup>azwj</sup> is more Exalted from that. The movement is a quality created by the deed’. I said, ‘So Allah<sup>azwj</sup> did not cease to be Speaking’. So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘The speech is a created quality, it is not with the eternality. Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Mighty and Majestic was, and He<sup>azwj</sup> did not Speak’.

text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ الْحُسَيْنِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ هِشَامِ بْنِ سَالِمٍ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ مُسْلِمٍ عَنْ أَبِي جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ سَمِعْتُهُ يَقُولُ كَانَ اللَّهُ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ وَ لَا شَيْ‏ءَ غَيْرُهُ وَ لَمْ يَزَلْ عَالِماً بِمَا يَكُونُ فَعِلْمُهُ بِهِ قَبْلَ كَوْنِهِ كَعِلْمِهِ بِهِ بَعْدَ كَوْنِهِ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Muhammad Bin Al Husayn, from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Hisham Bin Salim, from Muhammad Bin Muslim,

Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup>, said, ‘I heard him<sup>asws</sup> saying: ‘Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Mighty and Majestic was and there was nothing else apart from Him<sup>azwj</sup>, and He<sup>azwj</sup> has not ceased to be Knowing with what is going to occur, and He<sup>azwj</sup> Knew of it before its occurrence, just like His<sup>azwj</sup> Knowledge of it after its occurrence’.

text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ الْحُسَيْنِ عَنْ صَفْوَانَ بْنِ يَحْيَى عَنِ الْكَاهِلِيِّ قَالَ كَتَبْتُ إِلَى أَبِي الْحَسَنِ ( عليه السلام ) فِي دُعَاءٍ الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ مُنْتَهَى عِلْمِهِ فَكَتَبَ إِلَيَّ لَا تَقُولَنَّ مُنْتَهَى عِلْمِهِ فَلَيْسَ لِعِلْمِهِ مُنْتَهًى وَ لَكِنْ قُلْ مُنْتَهَى رِضَاهُ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Muhammad Bin Al Husayn, from Safwan Bin Yahya, from Al Kahily who said,

‘I wrote to Abu Al-Hassan<sup>asws</sup> regarding the supplication ‘The Praise is for Allah<sup>azwj</sup> the end-point of His<sup>azwj</sup> Knowledge’ (دُعَاءٍ الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ مُنْتَهَى عِلْمِهِ). So he<sup>asws</sup> wrote back: ‘Do not be saying, ‘End-point of His<sup>azwj</sup> Knowledge’, for there is no end-point to His<sup>azwj</sup> Knowledge. But, say, ‘End-point of His<sup>azwj</sup> Pleasure (for His<sup>azwj</sup> creatures)’.

text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ سَعْدِ بْنِ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنْ أَيُّوبَ بْنِ نُوحٍ أَنَّهُ كَتَبَ إِلَى أَبِي الْحَسَنِ ( عليه السلام ) يَسْأَلُهُ عَنِ اللَّهِ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ أَ كَانَ يَعْلَمُ الْأَشْيَاءَ قَبْلَ أَنْ خَلَقَ الْأَشْيَاءَ وَ كَوَّنَهَا أَوْ لَمْ يَعْلَمْ ذَلِكَ حَتَّى خَلَقَهَا وَ أَرَادَ خَلْقَهَا وَ تَكْوِينَهَا فَعَلِمَ مَا خَلَقَ عِنْدَ مَا خَلَقَ وَ مَا كَوَّنَ عِنْدَ مَا كَوَّنَ
فَوَقَّعَ بِخَطِّهِ لَمْ يَزَلِ اللَّهُ عَالِماً بِالْأَشْيَاءِ قَبْلَ أَنْ يَخْلُقَ الْأَشْيَاءَ كَعِلْمِهِ بِالْأَشْيَاءِ بَعْدَ مَا خَلَقَ الْأَشْيَاءَ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Sa’ad Bin Abdullah, from Muhammad Bin Isa, from Ayoub Bin Nuh,

‘He wrote to Abu Al-Hassan<sup>asws</sup> asking him<sup>asws</sup> about Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Mighty and Majestic, ‘Did He<sup>azwj</sup> Know of the things before He<sup>azwj</sup> Created the things and their occurrence (coming into being), or did He<sup>azwj</sup> not Know that until He<sup>azwj</sup> Created these and Intended their Creation and their coming into being, So He<sup>azwj</sup> Knew what He<sup>azwj</sup> Created during what He<sup>azwj</sup> Created, and what is to come into being during what came into being’.

So he<sup>asws</sup> signed: ‘Allah<sup>azwj</sup> never ceased to be Knowing of the thing before He<sup>azwj</sup> Created the things, just like His<sup>azwj</sup> Knowledge of the things after having Created the things’.

text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ سَهْلِ بْنِ زِيَادٍ عَنْ جَعْفَرِ بْنِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ حَمْزَةَ قَالَ كَتَبْتُ إِلَى الرَّجُلِ ( عليه السلام ) أَسْأَلُهُ أَنَّ مَوَالِيَكَ اخْتَلَفُوا فِي الْعِلْمِ فَقَالَ بَعْضُهُمْ لَمْ يَزَلِ اللَّهُ عَالِماً قَبْلَ فِعْلِ الْأَشْيَاءِ وَ قَالَ بَعْضُهُمْ لَا نَقُولُ لَمْ يَزَلِ اللَّهُ عَالِماً لِأَنَّ مَعْنَى يَعْلَمُ يَفْعَلُ فَإِنْ أَثْبَتْنَا الْعِلْمَ فَقَدْ أَثْبَتْنَا فِي الْأَزَلِ مَعَهُ شَيْئاً فَإِنْ رَأَيْتَ جَعَلَنِيَ اللَّهُ فِدَاكَ أَنْ تُعَلِّمَنِي مِنْ ذَلِكَ مَا أَقِفُ عَلَيْهِ وَ لَا أَجُوزُهُ
فَكَتَبَ ( عليه السلام ) بِخَطِّهِ لَمْ يَزَلِ اللَّهُ عَالِماً تَبَارَكَ وَ تَعَالَى ذِكْرُهُ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Muhammad, from Sahl Bin Ziyad, from Ja’far Bin Muhammad Bin Hamza who said,

‘I wrote to the man<sup>asws</sup> asking him<sup>asws</sup>, ‘The ones in your<sup>asws</sup> Wilayah are differing regarding the Knowledge. So, some of them say, ‘Allah<sup>azwj</sup> did not cease to be a Knower before He<sup>azwj</sup> Doing (Creating) the things’; and some of them say, ‘We are not saying that He<sup>azwj</sup> did not cease to be a Knower because the meaning of the knowledge is by a deed. So if we prove the Knowledge (as being eternal), so we have proved in the eternality, the things along with it’. So what is your<sup>asws</sup> view, may I be sacrificed for you<sup>asws</sup>, if you<sup>asws</sup> could teach me from that what I could pause upon and not exceed it’.
So he<sup>asws</sup> wrote in his<sup>asws</sup> own handwriting: ‘Allah<sup>azwj</sup> did not cease to be a Knower. Blessed and High is His<sup>azwj</sup> Mention’.

text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ الْحُسَيْنِ بْنِ سَعِيدٍ عَنِ الْقَاسِمِ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ عَبْدِ الصَّمَدِ بْنِ بَشِيرٍ عَنْ فُضَيْلِ بْنِ سُكَّرَةَ قَالَ قُلْتُ لِأَبِي جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) جُعِلْتُ فِدَاكَ إِنْ رَأَيْتَ أَنْ تُعَلِّمَنِي هَلْ كَانَ اللَّهُ جَلَّ وَجْهُهُ يَعْلَمُ قَبْلَ أَنْ يَخْلُقَ الْخَلْقَ أَنَّهُ وَحْدَهُ فَقَدِ اخْتَلَفَ مَوَالِيكَ فَقَالَ بَعْضُهُمْ قَدْ كَانَ يَعْلَمُ قَبْلَ أَنْ يَخْلُقَ شَيْئاً مِنْ خَلْقِهِ وَ قَالَ بَعْضُهُمْ إِنَّمَا مَعْنَى يَعْلَمُ يَفْعَلُ فَهُوَ الْيَوْمَ يَعْلَمُ أَنَّهُ لَا غَيْرُهُ قَبْلَ فِعْلِ الْأَشْيَاءِ فَقَالُوا إِنْ أَثْبَتْنَا أَنَّهُ لَمْ يَزَلْ عَالِماً بِأَنَّهُ لَا غَيْرُهُ فَقَدْ أَثْبَتْنَا مَعَهُ غَيْرَهُ فِي أَزَلِيَّتِهِ
فَإِنْ رَأَيْتَ يَا سَيِّدِي أَنْ تُعَلِّمَنِي مَا لَا أَعْدُوهُ إِلَى غَيْرِهِ فَكَتَبَ ( عليه السلام ) مَا زَالَ اللَّهُ عَالِماً تَبَارَكَ وَ تَعَالَى ذِكْرُهُ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Al Husayn Bin Saeed, from Al Qasim Bin Muhammad, from Abdul Samad Bin Bashir, from Fuzayl Bin sukkara who said,

‘I said to Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup>, ‘May I be sacrificed for you<sup>asws</sup>! If you<sup>asws</sup> see fit, if you<sup>asws</sup> could teach me, ‘Did Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, Majestic is His<sup>azwj</sup> Face, Know before He<sup>azwj</sup> Created the creation that He<sup>azwj</sup> is One, for the ones in your<sup>asws</sup> Wilayah are differing. So, some of them say, He<sup>azwj</sup> was Knowing before He<sup>azwj</sup> Creating a thing from His<sup>azwj</sup> creation’, and some of them say, ‘But rather, the meaning of knowing is His<sup>azwj</sup> Doing, thus today He<sup>azwj</sup> Knows that He<sup>azwj</sup> (is One), there being no other, before He Did (Create) the things. So they are saying, ‘It is proved for us that He<sup>azwj</sup> did not cease to be a Knower that He<sup>azwj</sup> (is One), there is none other, and so it is proved for us that there was other than Him<sup>azwj</sup> (i.e., Knowledge), along with Him<sup>azwj</sup> in His<sup>azwj</sup> eternality’.

So if you<sup>asws</sup> see fit, O my Chief<sup>asws</sup>, if you<sup>asws</sup> could teach me what I do not leave it to something else’. So he<sup>asws</sup> wrote: ‘Allah<sup>azwj</sup> did not cease to be a Knower. Blessed and High is His<sup>azwj</sup> Mention’.
